title: From Washington to Moscow, Indonesia Searches for the Right Nuclear Partner

title: Rupiah Under Pressure as Indonesia Market Outlook Weighs on Sentiment

title: Jakarta Stocks Pare Losses but End Lower Following MSCI Assessment
body: JCI closed lower on Thursday as MSCI downgrade concerns kept investors cautious despite heavy trading and sharp intraday swings.

title: Indonesia to Raise Minimum Free Float Requirement to 15% After MSCI Review
body: Indonesia will raise the minimum free float to 15% from 7.5% as regulators respond to MSCI concerns over market transparency.

title: JCI Slumps Nearly 6% After Trading Halt, Touched 10% Intraday
body: JCI slid nearly 6% by midday after a trading halt, having briefly plunged as much as 10% amid heavy selling pressure.

title: UBS, Goldman Cut Indonesia Equity Calls After MSCI Warning
body: UBS and Goldman cut Indonesia stock calls after MSCI warned of investability risks, raising fears of a downgrade and large capital outflows.

title: Merdeka Gold Resources Explores Potential Hong Kong Listing

title: Antam Gold Hits New All-Time High at Rp 3.16 Mill per Gram as Global Prices Rally

title: Breaking: JCI Tumbles 8% in First 30 Minutes on Thursday, Trading Halted

title: JCI Extends Losses on Thursday Post MSCI Index Freeze Announcement

title: Rupiah Rebounds on Dollar Weakness Ahead of Fed Decision

title: Danantara Says SOE Consolidation Based on Fundamentals, Not Arbitrary Cuts

title: MSCI Review Triggers Sharp Sell-Off as JCI Slides 7.35%

title: Breaking: IDX Halts Stock Trading After JCI Drops 8%
